hero.defaultBio: Crafting modern, responsive web applications with clean UI, robust backend architecture, and seamless user experiences.

about.title: About
about.defaultBio1: I'm a Full-Stack Developer with hands-on experience building fast, scalable, and responsive web applications using React.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL/MySQL.
about.defaultBio2: My skill set spans both frontend and backend development, with a strong focus on clean code, smooth user experiences, and animation-driven UI using libraries like Framer Motion.

projects.title: Featured
projects.subtitle: A curated collection of my best work

contact.title: Get In
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or just want to say hello? Drop me a message and let's create something amazing together.

form.name: Name
form.thankYou: Thank you! I'll get back to you soon.

info.title: Let's Connect
info.description: I'm always excited to work on new projects and collaborate with amazing people. Whether you have a specific project in mind or just want to explore possibilities, I'd love to hear from you.

footer.tagline: Building modern, high-performance web experiences through elegant design, clean code, and the latest technologies.

success.message: Thank you for reaching out. I'll get back to you within 24 hours.
